flawed_nl_solution:
If California had half the number of Coronavirus cases in New York, then the number of cases was 2000/2 = <<2000/2=10000>>10000 cases.
California had 400 more cases than the state of Texas, thus Texas had 10000-400 = <<10000-400=9600>>9600 cases.
The total number of Coronavirus cases in all of the three states is 9600+10000+2000 = <<9600+10000+2000=21600>>21600 cases.
#### 21600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1000, not 10000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
